function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in online purchasing leading to reduced foot traffic in small businesses, impacting their viability","Impact":"Financial strain on small businesses, potential closure, and loss of jobs","Mitigation":"Support and funding for small businesses to transition to online platforms, and assistance with digital marketing","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, digital marketing tools","People":"Small business owners, employees, and consumers","Owner":"Government, business associations"},{"Description":"Inadequate adoption of regenerative agriculture and urban agriculture leading to food insecurity","Impact":"Food shortages, lack of access to fresh produce, and increased reliance on imported food","Mitigation":"Promotion of regenerative and urban agriculture through subsidies, education, and incentives","Technologies":"Greenhouse technology, vertical farming systems, soil sensors","People":"Farmers, urban residents, and consumers","Owner":"Government, agricultural associations"},{"Description":"Disruption of global value chains due to exploitation of the pandemic for sustainable growth by certain countries","Impact":"Supply chain instability, trade disputes, and economic imbalance","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers, trade agreements, and investment in domestic production","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, trade analytics tools","People":"Importers, exporters, and government trade officials","Owner":"International trade organizations"}]}
